unnormalised: Yaar, solar rooftop subsidies are a great idea! Imagine saving money on electricity bills in Chennai heat. My cousin Priya in Bangalore installed one last year, got a subsidy and says her bill is almost zero! Perfect timing before Diwali expenses start piling up. Even if the initial cost seems high like Rs. 2 lakhs, the long-term savings are worth it, right? Now I can finally afford that extra plate of biryani during Onam. Anyone know if TEDA provides these subsidies easily?
normalised: Friend, solar rooftop subsidies are a great idea! Imagine saving money on electricity bills in Chennai heat. My cousin Priya in Bangalore installed one last year, got a subsidy and says her bill is almost zero! Perfect timing before Diwali expenses start piling up. Even if the initial cost seems high like rupee two lakhs, the long term savings are worth it, right? Now I can finally afford that extra plate of biryani during Onam.
